propertyFields.name: id?
propertyFields.description: An identification string which will be generated on its creation

propertyFields.name: name
propertyFields.description: Unique name, used for its identification

propertyFields.name: state
propertyFields.description: Identifies the subscription's current state, that is, if it's currently enabled or disabled

propertyFields.name: description?
propertyFields.description: Brief description of the action, e.g. explaining what it will be used for

propertyFields.name: snoozeTimestamp?
propertyFields.description: Unix timestamp format representing disablement of the subscription until the specified date and time

propertyFields.name: actions?
propertyFields.description: Action names that are executed on any matched event

propertyFields.name: conditions?
propertyFields.description: Condition names that are evaluated for any incoming event

propertyFields.name: labels?
propertyFields.description: Representing meaningful identifiers, which enable custom displaying & filtering capabilities
